name: Maybe You Should Relax In Space
name_original: Maybe You Should Relax In Space
description:
This is a compact audiovisual experience. Progression is vague, but take your time and discover as you go. There is no defined ending.

Space Cube likes to roll toward your cursor or finger.
Press escape to quit on Windows.

On Android versions where the navigation buttons disappear, swipe up from the bottom to reveal them.

Milky Way imagery adapted from ESO/S.Brunier
